BaseEditor
public static class BaseEditor.SetPageEditorKit
extends InetHtmlEditorKit

A modified InetHtmlEditorKit which fires an additional property change event after the read function has finished

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

BaseEditor.SetPageEditorKit

public BaseEditor.SetPageEditorKit(BaseEditor editor)
Creates the EditorKit for a certain BaseEditor instance. This instance will be notified after any call to the read mehtod of this editor kit

Parameters:
editor - the editor to be notified, must not be null
